report.title: Species counts league for event
report.description: An event (date and survey) filtered league table of taxon counts by warehouse user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM people p JOIN users u ON u.person_id=p.id AND u.deleted=false JOIN cache_occurrences o ON o.created_by_id=u.id AND o.survey_id=#survey_id# AND o.date_start>='#date_from#' AND o.date_start<='#date_to#' AND o.record_status<>'R' #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND p.deleted=false

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys
